Thabo Sefolosha

Pronunciation: \TAH-bow sef-a-LOW-sha\

Thabo Patrick Sefolosha ▪ Instagram: vevey1800

Position: Shooting Guard, Small Forward, and Power Forward ▪ Shoots: Right

6-6, 215lb (198cm, 97kg)

Born: May 2, 1984 in Vevey, Switzerland ch

Draft: Philadelphia 76ers, 1st round (13th pick, 13th overall), 2006 NBA Draft

NBA Debut: October 31, 2006

Career Length: 14 years
